Weight Analysis Report
======================================

```{r}

load("~/Documents/Personal/Weight Analysis/weight.RData")
require(ggplot2)
ggplot(weight, aes(x = Date, y = Mark)) +
    geom_path(colour='pink') +
    xlab('Date') +
    ylab('My Weight [Kg]') +
    ggtitle('Mark\'s Weight') +
    geom_smooth(colour='darkred', size=2, se=FALSE) +
    theme_bw()
```
